official_title: Joint resolution to designate February 8 to 14, 1976 as National Vocational Education and National Vocational Industrial Clubs of America (VICA) week.

summary.text: Designates February 8 to 14, 1976, as "National Vocational Education and National Vocational Industrial Clubs of America (VICA) Week".
